Name: Tay-Sachs disease
Definition: A motor neuron disease that is characterized by muscle spasticity

Name: Sandhoff disease
Definition: A GM2 gangliosidosis that is characterized by an accumulation of GM2 gangliosides

Name: GM2 gangliosidosis
Definition: A GM2 gangliosidosis that is characterized by normal hexosaminidase A (HEXA) and hexosaminidase B (HEXB) but the inability to form a functional GM2 activator complex.
